sourcesContent:
Username
Name is required.

Password
Password is required.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LocalService } from '../local.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor (private localStore: LocalService) {} login : string = ''; password : string = ''; loginError : boolean = false; passwordError : boolean = false; logIn() : void { } }
